name: Fall Saver
description: Fall Saver, is an endless arcade game, where you catch people falling from a burning building. The game was originally created for the 21st Weekly Game Jam (https://itch.io/jam/weekly-game-jam-21). Each game you have just a couple of lives and your goal is to save as many people as possible while dodging falling logs. To move use the left and right arrow keys. To catch a person just stand underneath him and you will automatically catch him, but beware that if you try to carry more than 5 people at once you will die (lose a life). To drop off a person stand in of the the corners of the building and press SPACE... Oh and also there is a really nice CRT filter: https://marketplace.yoyogames.com/assets/701/crt-pixel-shader
